title: Hydrogen technology activities in Slovenia
segmentation: Thank you very much, Mr. Chairman, thank you all of you to come on this presentation.
Hydrogen is new.
We will know that and because of that and because of the findings of European projects, that social acceptance is very important.
I will start.
Briefly speaking about climate change, we all know a lot about it and then.
Go from there to why Slovenia decided to implement and start implementing hydrogen as a technology and economy in the country.
We all know this graph pattern of changing temperature in global level is rising.
This figure starts from the early 1860 in America.
And we all know there are pros and cons.
Are temperatures rising or not?
But we all see that.
Petra.
Is increasing.
General public still thinks is there climate change?
Is there not, but a little bit humor approach specially for this acceptance and a little bit thinking.
We also see through the UN.

I'll start with human meat so we all know that human have some obligations, and especially regarding the production of food, energy supply, transport and clean and healthy living environment for all of this, we need energy and fuel and just stop for a second and think what would happen if there will be no more energy and more fuel to fuel around our transportation.
Our machines in the production facilities.

Because of that, I think also on our government group that energy sector and transfer section are are very important and especially for fuels, Becausw peak day of production of fossil fuels is behind us and from now on, peak demand and peak.
Production are going apart and we need to start thinking about alternatives.
How we going to fulfill demands of increasing transport sector?
Transport it produces 25% of the whole human global emissions.
And I think the car is still that stages same symbol an for example, I can compare UK and Slovenia in both countries for family person.
You have two to three vehicles or family to drive around, which I think is really wrong.
Approach.
If we're not, start thinking about the alternatives.
If we not, if we stop thinking about by feels we need to start thinking about the future and future alternative fuels.
Otherwise this will be our future.
Just for a little bit comparison Glacier mirror from Alaska 19.
Seven to six and in 2003 things are changing and a lot of this is because of the growing population energy sector.
Transport.
We need to start thinking about alternatives.
Why are we going to do solar wind?
Hydro and one of those alternatives is hydrogen as an energy carrier.
Hydrogen as an energy carrier will also help us to achieve those goals.
2020, 20 by 2020 be cause for now we have problems storing this energy from renewables, solar, wind, hydro.
If we store it in hydrogen then it can be used to transport sector, domestic sector and energy sector.
Developing fuels through the centuries.
Here you can see how things are continuing.
We started with hey coal, gasoline and us many leaders in Europe now are saying third Industrial revolution.
It will be hydrogen economy.
It's good to compare a little bit fuels what is existing.
What is hydrogen?
What kind of hydrogen can provide as a benefit?
From straight away we can see.
200% less emissions than normal foods now.
Also, the prices are almost there, even less if we take away.
Tax is an maybe suggest in Europe European Commission, which is say that hydrogen should not be taxed until 2024.
User implementation and support.
Why Slovenia decided for hydrogen as an energy carrier?
There are three main issues.
Forest protection of the environment and human health.
And use of hydrogen in vehicles produce zero emissions.
Yes, there are debates how the hydrogen is produced.
Yes countries.
Germany, America, Spain, their carrying out demonstration project for more than 10 years.
They can already now start thinking that maybe in 2 three years time.
Production of hydrogen from renewable sources will be around 20%, the same as California decided now in the legislation level.
But in Slovenia we just started with this process a year ago.
At the moment hydrogen will be produced from fossil fuels from natural gas, but already there plans for production other renewable sources.
Energy security local hydrogen production that means Slovenia is not dependent anymore on fossil fuels or natural gas.
Hydrogen can be produced.
Solar, wind, hydropower, sanchar or connector electrical network.
That means that small municipalities, small regions in Slovenia can be totally independent and produce locali hydrogen for their demands.
And as I said, production of energy from numerous sources.
This will also help Slovenia to achieve those goals.
One thing that a lot of developed countries in the world already saw this opportunity is market development.
We should see climate change as a new business opportunity, not as a threat to our local existing industry technical technological development.

Already, some companies in Slovenia producing components of the for the fuel cell systems we see we're looking this a little bit more in advance to have ability in Slovenia to produce the whole fuel cell system we already have at least two.
Industry industry partners who can produce who can produce frame of the bus.
So in the long run we are aiming to produce hydrogen bus in Slovenia.
And as I said before, sustainable energy supply where also main electric provider in Slovenia is now on board to take hydrogen in their activities.

Little by Slovenian context government, Slovenia in 2007 confirmed national project hydrogen economy, which is saying that by 2013 we should have 300 vehicles, 12 refueling stations around the country.
Add note to tease for implementation.
We know what we would like.
We now need to make plan to make this realistic first.
What we did check standards and legislation on the national level on the European level and see what needs to be done in the country.
What can be transported from the European level?
Production of the hydrogen.
It's already in place at the moment, will be used in industrial production because there is a company who's producing hydrogen for their activities anyway.
Since before April last year they were burning this hydrogen.
Now they're just going to clean it so we can then transform it to the refilling station and use it in the vehicles long run.
Yes, Slovenia will be on the path to produce hydrogen from renewable sources.
Distribution is also in place.
And now it's project in the development that in February next year, Slovenia will have first refueling station in Capital City.
Addition to this.
If there's a fueling station, we also need vehicles we are already in line with three major car manufacturers for vehicles to bring in Slovenia.
10 biggest Slovenian companies are very interesting to use.
This kind of vehicles, and there is additional projects.
Connect Capital City of Ljubljana with airport vernick with hydrogen bus.
Regarding the hydrogen bus, I would like to mention we just finished calculations today for the capital city.
If the existing buses are changed with hydrogen vehicles, we came up that we can save per year 8260 tons of CO2.
Our future if we start thinking sustainably.
If we start thinking to new alternatives, I think we have a good chance, as in this picture on the display.
This was very brief.
We all knew hygiene is new.
There is a lot of activities going on in Slovenia.
So what I would suggest is.
Contact me over the phone over the email.
We can have discussion today after our presentations tonight at the dinner and may or may be continued during the week you will see what kind of activities?
We can cooperate to strengthen this implementation.
Apology in studio.
Thank you very much.
Anyone who wants to take the opportunity to.
Ask a little bit about the Slovenian experience.
Yes, at the moment the 1st at the moment we are still discussing what interest is with BMW from Germany to have their vehicles in Slovenia.
If their interest will be really high then the new refilling station will also support refueling with liquid hydrogen.
Otherwise becausw all the other car manufacturers are using compressed hydrogen.
Then compressed hydrogen will be used an at the moment is still planned to be transported and stored as in gases.
But if the development with BMW will continue in a good discussion, then the most probably the transportation and storage would be in liquid form and then dispensing in liquid and gases.
Any more questions please?
Be cause these activities are going on for now little bit more than a year.
At the moment there are four ministries involved in this development and for now we divided these activities on different projects.
So at the moment I can only tell you that what are.
Financial activities for this refueling station and the amount the level of the money is 800,000 euros.
All other activities are already taken already in place, so we're not thinking about them anymore.
We only looking how things are going to develop in the future.

Of course, more activities, more money, but with good work that we did so far, and the future government elections are going to take place in the fall, then we're going to start thinking to the future financial plan for the next three or four years.
Thank you and final one.
Thank you, thank you.
